column1: '''Celebrant''' (translated as '''Silverlode''') was a stream rising in the eastern [[Misty Mountains]] from the [[Mirrormere]] in the [[Dimrill Dale]]. It then ran through [[Lothl처rien]] where it was met by the [[Nimrodel (river)
column2: Nimrodel]] river, and emptied into the [[Anduin]].
2994}} an army of orcs came up the Silverlode and wiped out the colony of Dwarves dwelling in [[Moria]].<ref>{{FR

3018}} [[Elladan]] and [[Elrohir]], sent by [[Elrond]] to a secret errand, passed down the Silverlode into a "strange country" and were the last to return to [[Rivendell]], in [[December]].<ref name=south/>

column1: The [[Fellowship of the Ring]] followed this river when they travelled from Moria to Lothl처rien.<ref name=south>{{FR
''Celebrant'' is a [[Sindarin]] name, consisting of ''[[celeb]]'', "silver" and ''[[rant]]'', "course".<ref name="S">{{S
The element ''lode'' in ''Silverlode'' means "course, water-channel".<ref name="Nomen">{{HM
These names were also a translation of ''[[Kibil-n창la]]'' in [[Khuzdul]], the language of [[Dwarves]].
